channel.title: Design project
channel.description:
hey
so for my finite state machine course, we have the opportunity to choose a project of our own to make, some old ones made last year were, http://www.eecg.toronto.edu/~janders/241_videos/MPEG/.writing pad, games etc..
i really have no idea what to make, i was thinking about a game, but i also want to make a touch pad, which was already done a few years back, but it used wires and only worked when you pressed hard. any ideas?

item.title: Design project
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Make a processor. Couple of 181s, 273s, 244s, lil bit of glue logic and an EEPROM or an SRAM and you are good to go.

Read full topic
